org.webcurator.core.store.arc
Class ArcDigitalAssetStoreService

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.store.arc.ArcDigitalAssetStoreService
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogProvider, DigitalAssetStore
public class ArcDigitalAssetStoreService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DigitalAssetStore, LogProvider

The ArcDigitalAssetStoreService is used for storing and accessing the completed harvest data from the digital asset store.

Author:
bbeaumont

save

public void save(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                 java.lang.String directory,
                 java.io.File[] files)
          throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore
Save an array of files to the digital asset store. The files are saved to the first harvest result, so this method should be used only for files coming directly from the Harvest Agent.

Specified by:
save in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance to save the files to.
directory - The subdirectory under the target instance directory to which to save the files.
files - An array of files to send to the asset store.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.
See Also:
DigitalAssetStore.save(String, String, File[]).

getResource

public java.io.File getResource(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                                int harvestResultNumber,
                                HarvestResourceDTO resourcex)
                         throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore
Retrieve a resource from the Digital Asset Store. The resource is returned as a SOAP attachment and written to disk for use. This is ideal for streaming large resources.

Specified by:
getResource in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance that the resource belongs to.
harvestResultNumber - The index of the harvest result, within the target instance, that contains the resource.
resourcex - The resource to retrieve.
Returns:
The resource, as a file.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.
See Also:
DigitalAssetStore.getResource(String, int, HarvestResourceDTO).

getSmallResource

public byte[] getSmallResource(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                               int harvestResultNumber,
                               HarvestResourceDTO resourcex)
                        throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore
Retrieves a resource transferring it as a byte array, rather than as a SOAP attachment. This method is appropriate for small resources where streaming is not required. It has additional memory requirements, but has no file I/O.

Specified by:
getSmallResource in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance that the resource belongs to.
harvestResultNumber - The index of the harvest result, within the target instance, that contains the resource.
resourcex - The resource to retrieve.
Returns:
The resource, as a file.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.
See Also:
DigitalAssetStore.getSmallResource(String, int, HarvestResourceDTO).

                                     int orgHarvestResultNum,
                                     int newHarvestResultNum,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> urisToDelete,
                                     java.util.List<HarvestResourceDTO> hrsToImport)
                              throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore
Create a new Harvest Result by pruning resources out of an existing harvest result.

Specified by:
copyAndPrune in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance to which the harvest results belong.
orgHarvestResultNum - The original harvest result number to prune.
newHarvestResultNum - The number for the new harvest result.
urisToDelete - A List of resource URIs that should be pruned.
Returns:
The HarvestResultDTO of the pruned harvest result.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.
See Also:
DigitalAssetStore#copyAndPrune(String, int, int, List).

submitToArchive

public void submitToArchive(java.lang.String targetInstanceOid,
                            java.lang.String SIP,
                            java.util.Map xAttributes,
                            int harvestNumber)
                     throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore
Submits a harvest result to the archive. This method will use a callback to send the unique identifier returned from the archive.

Specified by:
submitToArchive in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:
targetInstanceOid - The OID of the target instance.
SIP - The XML SIP file.
xAttributes - A Map of indexed attributes. This map may or may not be used by the archive adapter implementation.
harvestNumber - The number of the harvest result to submit.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.
See Also:
DigitalAssetStore.submitToArchive(String, String, Map, int).

Description copied from interface: DigitalAssetStore

Specified by:
getCustomDepositFormDetails in interface DigitalAssetStore
Parameters:

Returns:
